US imposes sanctions on Ecuador's Los Choneros gangThe United States on Wednesday imposed sanctions on Ecuador criminal group Los Choneros and its leader, the U.S. Treasury Department said in a statement. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 20:50:47 GMT DHOZDXE5IJPB5L5OYQE3VWTZNI https://www.reuters.com/world/us-imposes-sanctions-ecuadors-los-choneros-gang-2024-02-07/Reuters世界
Footballer Dani Alves denies sexual assault before Barcelona courtBrazilian former footballer Dani Alves maintained that he had consensual sex and did not act violently in his encounter with a woman in a Barcelona nightclub in 2022 as he gave his testimony on Wednesday in a trial on charges of sexual assault. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 20:38:09 GMT YFXB326UV5PDTFO576OSK3XXI4 https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/footballer-dani-alves-denies- Sex-assault-before-barcelona-court-2024-02-07/Joan Faus运动的足球
UN team has begun mission to assess conditions in northern Gaza -BlinkenA U.N. team has begun its mission to northern Gaza to assess conditions for civilians who remain there and assess what needs to be done to allow displaced Palestinians to return home, U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken said in Tel Aviv on Wednesday. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 20:33:30 GMT FJB2MLPMUJIHPAYL3J52EUIUSU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-team-has-begun-mission-assess-conditions-northern-gaza-blinken-2024-02-07/Reuters世界中东
Turkish man jailed for 20 years for role in Italian migrant shipwreck - mediaA Turkish citizen has been sentenced to 20 years in jail in Italy for his part in a migrant shipwreck last year in which at least 94 people were killed, Italian media reported on Wednesday. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 20:25:50 GMT ZNSP3ERB6ZMSXCGA76SLBPGJYQ https://www.reuters.com/world/turkish-man-jailed-20-years-role-italian-migrant-shipwreck-media-2024-02-07/Reuters世界
Salvadoran-Canadian writer arrested for election protest has been released, government saysA Salvadoran-Canadian writer who was arrested for reading aloud the constitution inside a voting center on Sunday to protest the participation of President Nayib Bukele has been released from jail, a government adviser said on Wednesday. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 20:07:11 GMT ZM3OLHMSNBO2HM75YJ3VYXPFKE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/salvadoran-canadian-writer-arrested-election-protest-has-been-released-2024-02-07/Sarah Kinosian, Nelson Renteria世界美洲
Israeli forces kill three Palestinians in raid on West Bank refugee camp, officials sayIsraeli forces killed three Palestinians during a raid on a refugee camp in the occupied West Bank on Wednesday, officials said, as U.S. top diplomat Antony Blinken stressed the need to de-escalate tensions during a visit to the region. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 20:04:25 GMT XLVKONAR5BKOLGJVT75NZXRK7Y https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-forces-kill- Three-palestinians-raid-west-bank-refugee-camp-officials-say-2024-02-07/Reuters世界中东
Azerbaijan's President Aliyev leads presidential election with 92.1% of vote -commissionIncumbent President Ilham Aliyev opened a big lead in Azerbaijan's presidential election on Wednesday with 92.1% of the vote, according to preliminary results quoted by the country's election commission. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 19:34:52 GMT PJXG4TMNURINPMUBOGJTUARWUU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/azerbaijans-president-aliyev-leads-presidential-election-with-921-vote-2024-02-07/Reuters世界亚太地区
Nicaragua grants asylum to Panama's ex-President MartinelliNicaragua's government said on Wednesday it had granted asylum to Panama's former President Ricardo Martinelli, after the ex-leader, currently facing a lengthy prison sentence at home, requested the protection at Nicaragua's embassy in Panama City. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 19:28:19 GMT OVNUWV3I3JPUJILBB6WMYVN7SQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/nicaragua-grants-asylum-panamas-ex-president-martinelli-2024-02-07/Reuters世界美洲
Islamic state claims responsibility for blast in southwestern Pakistan -group's Telegram channelIslamic state claimed the responsibility for a blast in southwestern Pakistan, the group's Telegram channel said on Wednesday. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 18:49:30 GMT WNJBIGKF5BPWTLI4IUYCVIYVVE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/islamic-state-claims-responsibility-blast-southwestern-pakistan-groups-telegram-2024-02-07/Reuters世界亚太地区
Kataib Hezbollah commander killed in Baghdad drone strike -sourcesSenior commander Abu Baqir al-Saadi of Kataib Hezbollah, an Iran-backed armed group in Iraq that the Pentagon linked to an attack that killed three U.S. troops, died in a drone strike on a vehicle in eastern Baghdad on Wednesday night, two security sources said. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 18:42:54 GMT 7XQB726O5ZPEFJEWTQ773JJ4B4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/sound-loud-blasts-heard-iraqs-baghdad-reuters-witness-2024-02-07/Ahmed Rasheed, Timour Azhari世界中东
Former Albanian navy port to take in migrants sent on from ItalyAn Albanian port that was once home to the country's navy is set to receive African, Asian and Middle East migrants sent on from Italy as part of a deal that has drawn criticism from human rights groups. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 17:39:41 GMT G3T42HZDFFMTVJC624253P4E5I https://www.reuters.com/world/former-albanian-navy-port-take-migrants-sent-italy-2024-02-07/Florion Goga世界
